bptree

Class Node<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bptree.Node<K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeafNode, NonLeafNode

    public abstract class Node<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>>
extends java.lang.Object
    The Node class implements nodes that constitute a B+-tree.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Node(int degree)
      Constructs a Node.
      Node(Node<K> node)
      Copy-constructs a Node.

      Clears this Node.

      Copies the specified keys and their pointers of the specified Node into this Node.
      K firstKey()
      Returns the first key of this Node.
      boolean hasRoom()
      Determines whether or not this Node has room for a new entry.
      K key(int i)
      Returns the key at the specified index.

      Returns the number of keys in this Node.

      • copy

        public void copy(Node<K> node,
        int beginIndex,
        int endIndex)
        Copies the specified keys and their pointers of the specified Node into this Node.
        Parameters:
        node - a Node.
        beginIndex - the beginning index of the keys, inclusive.
        endIndex - the ending index of the keys, exclusive.
